description.en:
### Do Doujin Artists Dream of Cosplay Sex?

1. Do Doujin Artists Dream of Cosplay Sex? / Doujin Sakka wa Cosplay Ecchi no Yume o Miru ka (同人作家はコスプレえっちの夢を見るか); COMIC Anthurium 2020-05
2. Do Doujin Artists Dream of Cosplayer Girlfriends? / Doujin Sakka wa Layer Kanojo no Yume o Miru ka (同人作家はレイヤー彼女の夢を見るか); COMIC Anthurium 2020-12
3. Do Doujin Artists Dream of Threesome Sex After Work? / Doujin Sakka wa After 3P no Yume o Miru ka (同人作家はアフター3Pの夢を見るか); COMIC Anthurium 2021-06
4. Do Cosplayer Girlfriends Dream of Their Favorite Artists? / Layer Kanojo wa Oshi Sakka no Yume o Miru ka (レイヤー彼女は推し作家の夢を見るか); COMIC Anthurium 2021-10
5. The 3B Law That Gives Me Joy / Boku ga Yorokobu 3B no Housoku (3Bの僕が喜ぶ法則); COMIC Anthurium 2020-09
6. Night Mist Initiation / Yogasumi no Senrei (夜霞の洗礼); COMIC Anthurium 2019-12
7. Master and Servant Reversal / Shujuu Reversi (主従リバーシ); COMIC Anthurium 2019-09
8. Unfamiliar Face / Hatsugao (初顔); COMIC Anthurium 2019-06
9. Do Doujin Artists Dream of Being the Popular Artist? / Doujin Sakka wa Urekko Sakka no Yume o Miru ka? (同人作家は売れっ子作家の見るか？); kakioroshi
